entry.title: Amlou
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type: argane achifae
Price: 0.00

Amlou is a Berber exceptionally nourishing spread Food. It is ultra rich in protein and Vitamin E,  mineral salts and vitamins,digestive enzymes,
Amlou is content of pure honey, sweet almond , and edible Argan oil. It is traditionally consumed in the Souss of Morocco ( Agadir ) in plat like breakfast and barcoucse. It helps with digestion and the absorption of fats, stimulates insulin release, contributes to lowering bad cholesterol levels, and provides energy and strength. It is thus particularly recommended in the morning every day.

Amlou an exceptionally Food Moroccan breakfast spread. Made with Sweet Almonds, Argan Oil, and USDA  organic and pure Honey. A must spread which complements Moroccan meal tray.

Moroccan Amlou is known all over the world. Who does not know the Bercoucs, Moroccan couscous, and the famous Moroccan Gastronomy.

Amlou always used a variety of bread. 

Amlou is Somthing special for Berber Amazigh Women, Amlou is tradition of Our Life here in Souss Agadir from Child old, 

Amlou is a Paste Berber Moroccan edible preparation made from sweet almonds, of organic argan oil and pure honey. It is a tonic that is served at breakfast, as a snack, in spreadable paste on barley bread, corn or wheat. Amlou Food also brings all kinds of pastry. The preparation is made on the basis of toasted almonds and looted, oil roasted Argan food and pure honey Natural.

entry.title: Green Clay Skin Facial Mask
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type: argane achifae
Price: 0.00

The Green Clay is found naturally in Morocco. It is composed of iron oxides and kelp seaweed, along with other decomposed plant matter, that contribute to its green color. The Green Clay Skin Facial Mask is mined from naturally occurring deposits, is then sun dried and crushed down to its finest form. Because of its unique healing properties, it has been widely used for centuries in both cosmetic and medicinal remedies.

Green Clay Skin Facial Mask is rich in magnesium, calcium, potassium, silicon, selenium, aluminum, titanium, cobalt, sodium, phosphorus, copper and zinc. This extraordinary blend of minerals makes French Green Clay one of the most absorbent cosmetic clays. With its negative charge and very fine texture, it acts as a magnet, drawing out the negatively charged toxins and poisons from the skin, washing away impurities and leaving your skin clear, smooth and hydrated. Compared to other clays, Green Clay Skin Facial Mask  not stripping like Bentonite Green Clay Mask and it is more absorbent than Kaolin Green Clay Skin Facial Mask , making it a better and safer choice for all skin types.

Green Clay Mask has a natural detoxifying properties, Green Clay Skin Facial Mask  is the best choice for naturally treating acne by going deep into the pores and removing impurities from our oil glands. It also regenerates healthy skin growth and decreases the reoccurrence of future breakouts.

entry.title: White Clay Skin Facial Mask
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type: argane achifae
Price: 0.00

The White Clay Also known as Kaolin Clay, White Clay is a very fine, soft and light powder with naturally absorbent properties. Gentle and smooth on skin, White Clay Skin Facial Mask is a great option for almost all skin types, working really well for normal skin types (skin that is neither oily nor dry), as well as mature skin. White Clay Skin Facial Mask works as a very mild exfoliant, gently removing dead and dry skin cells to leave you with clarified, glowing skin as well as reducing the size of your pores, which makes White Clay Skin Facial Mask the perfect pre-makeup masks, your foundation will just glide on! It also works to very gently draw out dirt, oil and grime from deep within the pores.

 

This  White Clay Skin Facial Mask is a favourite of mine as it really works to gently cleanse and detoxify the skin, brightening the complexion and leaving your skin looking and feeling incredibly smooth. Harnessing the cleansing properties of Australian White Clay Skin Facial Mask, this purifying and brightening mask is ideal for all skin types, working to draw out impurities and absorb excess oil without stripping the skin of its natural moisture. Vegan, Australian made and Gluten Free, it can be mixed with water to form a paste, applied White Clay Skin Facial Mask to the face, then left on for 15 to 20 minutes.

entry.title: Argan Oil Culinary Extra Virgin
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type: argane achifae
Price: 0.00

It is our mission to offer the best quality  Extra Virgin Culinary Argan Oil as it is the best edible vegetable oil in the world. Deliciously tasting, superb in composition, and nutritious. The poster child for sustainable sourcing. Undiluted, pure and organic certified. Tested for centuries, rarely produced for use outside the local communities.

Supply chain

* Based in morocco since 2006, we have established relations with the argan community involved in the Argan oil production and sharing our passion in providing the best product possible. Pure, undiluted- and tasty! We engage with scientists, researchers, share knowledge, participate in clinical trials studying the benefits of Argan oil for humans and publish results on this website.

Sustainability

* Wild harvested by hand and respectfully sourced in the Argan Bio-Reservoir around Tardouant where the terroir is hilly. The argan trees root deep and sun and winds have positive effects on the quality of the argan fruits.

* Cracked by hand, the kernels are selected for artisan roasting by our ‘maître torréfacteur’ monitoring temperature, time and texture.  After quality control, kernels are cold-pressed produced in small batches, with a rigid filtration process to provide top quality culinary argan oil.

* Best in class manufacturing standards, with a keen eye on hygienic standards, are observed. Tests on the chemical composition -acidity-, texture, and taste ensure only the best quality, Extra Virgin, is released for bottling into our black colored bottles.

Transparency

Transparency in the value chain is key, and organic certification, such as 100% USDA organic, ensures standards are met and a paper trail on origin and pressing is documented. Before export, a government agency lab has to release shipments after testing on purity and acidity: Extra-Virgin or Virgin.            

Delicious

But the taste is something different -and experience and knowledge matter to get a great tasting oil. Our Extra Virgin Argan Oil (EVAO) has a delightful nutty taste and is very versatile to cook, marinate, bake or finish with.  The result is a luminous oil balancing a slight flavor reminiscent of hazelnut and pistachio, with a crisp and pleasant robust finish. No worries about nut allergies, as the argan kernel is a stone fruit, just like a peach.

Healthy

Proven to help reduce cholesterol, cardiovascular disease and much more. Never diluted, nothing artificial added. Clean label: one ingredient. Tasty and Healthy, enjoy!

entry.title: HENNA MOROCCAN WITH HERBALS IN POWDER 200 Gr
entry.s:vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZINEGLOB | First producer of Organic Moroccan Argan oil
Type: argane achifae
Price: 0.00

This is one of the most natural remedies used in oriental countries. Pure source of beauty and color, henna powder is usually used for body art and tattoos. As it’s applied to dye and cure hair and skin. It strengthens eyelashes and eyebrows, nourishes and softens the skin. This flowering plant grows in Morocco and its young leaves are dried out, milled and sifted to get green-brownish or light green powder. More than tanning agents of henna, this organic product provides precious gum and organic acids, vitamins C and K. It improves hair structure, by making it thicker and glossier. It eliminates the dandruff as it nourishes splitting and damaged locks and even cures hair loss.

Henna can be used as a natural hair dye, since it produces all shades of red. Mix the powder with hot water and some lemon juice to get light red, or with infused coffee to get a deep maroon shade. The used quantity depends on the lengh of hair. Colorless henna is ideal for a hair mask. Put 50g of colorless henna powder and add boiled water then leave the mixture for 5 to7 min. Apply the mask on the hair roots and on the whole length of your hair then wait for an hour. Wash and rinse you hair as usual. The colorless henna for skin is the perfect product to fight small wrinkles. Mix 10g of henna powder with a bit of boiled water and a couple of drops of lemon juice to create a face and body mask. Wait 5 minutes then rinse. With regular application once up to twice a week, the effect on the skin is simply superb!

Upon applying the beard oil you immediately find yourself walking through a Moroccan market surrounded by exotic scents and sights — ready for whatever adventure might present itself.  For a true man of the world, Morocco will have you daydreaming endlessly of spontaneous adventures to faraway places.

Ingredients

Sweet Almond Oil, Safflower Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Fragrance*, Olive Oil, and Castor Oil

  • Natural oils keep facial hair soft and reduce itchiness associated with beard growth

  • Includes shaker insert to make dispensing easy

Beyond their great smell, the bath salts contain magnesium, potassium, calcium, bromide, and sodium. These minerals are easily absorbed by the pores to cleanse and purify the skin and to improve its radiance, tone, and texture. The presence of magnesium helps to fight fatigue and to release tension. Moreover calcium balances water retention while it helps stave off osteoporosis. Potassium keeps the skin moisturize when bromide soothes tired and sore muscles. Concerning sodium, it balances and manages the lymphatic fluid in our bodies. Over all the bath salts soothe and nourish the skin while it act efficiently on your mood. After your bath you will feel calm and relaxed.

How to use :

Add a handful of bath salts into the hot water of your bathtub then relax in the bath for 15 to 20 minutes. Enjoy the multiple benefits of bath salts without any side effects.

entry.title: GHASSOUL CLAY IN POWDER CERTIFIED ORGANIC 200GR
entry.s:vendor: arganorganic
entry.summary:
Vendor: arganorganic
Type: argane achifae
Price: 0.00

Ghassoul or Lava Clay, is mined from ancient deposits within the Morocco Atlas Mountains. This clay is the result of natural geothermal processes and volcanic activity. Its very rich in minerals mainly silicon, magnesium, iron, sodium, potassium, lithium, and trace elements. That’s why it’s considered as an exceptional ingredient for skin and hair care. <br> Ghassoul has an incomparable ability to absorb impurities and excess of sebum. It lessens dryness, improves the skin clarity and elasticity and has extractive abilities that confiscate impurities and unblock pores.

How to use :

It can be used as natural shampoo by mixing 50g of ghassoul with some water untill getting a paste to apply on the scalp and the hair. The same mixture can be used as face and body mask. It’s recommended to mix ghassoul with rose water to obtain better results.

Its gentle foam cleans the scalp while nourishing it in depth with vitamins and antioxidents. It removes all dirtness and procures moisture, softness and volume.

This conditioner with rose water is indicated for dry and limp hair. Thanks to its formula rich in vitamins and antioxidents, it hydrates and moisturizes the hair deeply for a smooth and silky strands. It helps to deliver moisture where needed the most, it’s the product to include in everyday hair care routine. Use this conditioner after the shampoo with rose to deliver optimum benefits to your hair. It helps to repair dry and damaged hair, to catch up on regular hair washing routine, the conditioner with rose is the must product to enjoy hair that feels richly moisturized and more manageable, all in the time it takes to wash and rinse.

How to use :

Wash your hair with rose shampoo, then rinse out and wring out your hair. Apply rose conditionner on hair’s strands and insist on the ends to nourish them deeply. Let the conditioner with rose set for 2 to 3 minutes then rinse out to get smoothy and silky hair.
